text: Roberto Secundino Digón (25 July 1935 – 30 January 2022) was an Argentine politician and sports executive. He was a member of the Justicialist Party. He was in the Argentine Chamber of Deputies from 1985 to 1989 and again from 1993 to 1997. Digón was born in Buenos Aires, Argentina. He was a sports executive for Boca Juniors. Digón died of COVID-19 in Buenos Aires on 30 January 2022, at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Buenos Aires Category:Argentine businesspeople Category:Sportspeople from Buenos Aires Category:Argentine politicians
title: Roberto Digón
